atoms_count.description: Number of non-water atoms observed experimentally in the asymmetric unit.

molecular_weight.description: Molecular weight of all non-water atoms in the asymmetric unit.

id.description: ID (accession) from external resource linked to this entry.

link.description: Link to this entry in external resource.

pubmed_id.description: Unique integer value assigned to each PubMed record.

pubmed_central_id.description: Unique integer value assigned to each PubMed Central record.

doi.description: Persistent identifier used to provide a link to an article location on the Internet.

abstract_text.description: A concise, accurate and factual mini-version of the paper contents.

affiliation_info.description: The institution(s) that the author is affiliated with. Multiple affiliations per author are allowed.

mesh_heading_list.description:
NLM controlled vocabulary, Medical Subject Headings (MeSH), 
 is used to characterize the content of the articles represented by MEDLINE citations.

value.description: Binding affinity value between a ligand and its target molecule.

unit.description:
Binding affinity unit. 
 Dissociation constant Kd is normally in molar units (or millimolar , micromolar, nanomolar, etc). 
 Association constant Ka is normally expressed in inverse molar units (e.g. M-1).

symbol.description: Binding affinity symbol indicating approximate or precise strength of the binding.

reference_sequence_identity.description: Data point provided by BindingDB. Percent identity between PDB sequence and reference sequence.

provenance_code.description: The resource name for the related binding affinity reference.

external_link.description: Link to external resource referencing the data.
